com.wm.adapter.sap.idoc
Class IDataRecord

java.lang.Object
  com.wm.adapter.sap.idoc.IDataRecord
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocRecord, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
IDataDocument, IDataSegment
public class IDataRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocRecord

Class that serves as a basic instance for accessing structured IDoc data elements using IData to implement the IDocRecord interface.

Note, that the IDataRecord implementation works without meta data and therefore cannot check values for correctness when setting field values.

See Also:
Serialized Form
